<h3 id="X11194">X(11194)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTROID OF THE TANGENTIAL TRIANGLE OF THE 2nd CIRCUMPERP TRIANGLE; TCCT 6.24</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (3 a^3-3 a b^2+4 a b c-2 b^2 c-3 a c^2-2 b c^2): :
